data.Dictionary_text: ( John 10:23 ; Acts 3:11 ; 5:12 ), a colonnade, or cloister probably, on the eastern side of the temple. It is not mentioned in connection with the first temple, but Josephus mentions a porch, so called, in Herod's temple (q.v.).

data.Event_Name: Apostles work signs and wonders in Solomon's Portico
